title: Virat Kohli Wants People To Leave Rohit Sharma Alone And Let Him Enjoy Test Cricket
text:
Virat Kohli Wants People To Leave Rohit Sharma Alone And Let Him Enjoy Test Cricket

Virat Kohli Wants People To Leave Rohit Sharma Alone And Let Him Enjoy Test Cricket

Virat Kohli wants people to allow Rohit Sharma to enjoy his batting which will help India.

"If a guy like him at the top of the order plays the way he does, we are going to be in situations to go for victory in most of the Test matches. So we are all very happy for him. It's time to let Rohit Sharma enjoy his batting in red-ball cricket," said Kohli.

AFP

Rohit slammed twin centuries on his opening debut in Tests.

Since he was made opener in the limited overs format, he has established himself as one of the best in the world. Sadly that consistency has been lacking in Tests.

Of course now all that is changing.

He also rose 36 places to to be ranked 17 in among Test batsmen, his highest till date.

AFP

India will hope Rohit can continue his form in Pune as India look to wrap up the series with a game to spare.

With Inputs From PTI.
